mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupReply (replyBoardNum, groupName, userId, subject, content, groupNumber, depth, orderNo, parent) VALUES (#{replyBoardNum}, #{groupName}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{groupNumber}, #{depth}, #{orderNo}, #{parent})
mapper.update: UPDATE groupReply SET hitcount= hitcount+1 WHERE replyBoardNum = #{replyBoardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT replyBoardNum, r.userId, r.subject, r.content, groupNumber, depth, orderNo, parent, hitcount, r.created,r.groupName FROM groupReply r JOIN member m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE replyBoardNum = #{replyBoardNum}
